Text.Page:
They sent me down the eastern passageway on a recon mission, but I ran into the {@LinkCreature:11#3006#Red Lash berserkers} before I got very far.

I can't sneak past them, and I can't kill them. I'm stuck.

Can you tear through themâ€”just disrupt them for a while so I can do my recon? I hate to go back to base empty-handed.
That's a lot of carnage, <PCNAME>. I'll head down there once the blood stops dripping.
